mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, tenant_name, remark, `status`, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_tenant (id, tenant_id, tenant_name, remark, `status`, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{item.id},#{item.tenantId},#{item.tenantName},#{item.remark},#{item.status},#{item.version},#{item.createBy},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateBy},#{item.updateTime},#{item.isDelete})

INSERT INTO sys_tenant
id, tenant_id, tenant_name, remark, `status`, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete,
#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{tenantName}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{version}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete},
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = values(id), tenant_id = values(tenant_id), tenant_name = values(tenant_name), remark = values(remark), `status` = values(`status`), version = values(version), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)

insert into sys_tenant (id, tenant_id, tenant_name, remark, `status`, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{item.id},#{item.tenantId},#{item.tenantName},#{item.remark},#{item.status},#{item.version},#{item.createBy},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateBy},#{item.updateTime},#{item.isDelete})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = values(id), tenant_id = values(tenant_id), tenant_name = values(tenant_name), remark = values(remark), `status` = values(`status`), version = values(version), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)
